snippet.title: Empires of the Undergrowth - First look at The Surface
snippet.description:
A short collection of game play clips from the beach environment. The surface has various dangerous creatures, large amounts of resources and an enemy colony. 

Watch as the player's colony reaches the overground, battles tiger beetles, then gathers enough resources to push the enemy colony back into its nest and kill its queen.

Empires of the Undergrowth is currently in development by Slug Disco Studios - follow us on social media for frequent updates!

Twitter: https://twitter.com/slugdisco
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/slugdisco/
